Pre-Game Insights: Granit Xhaka to register a shot on target has been price boosted to 3/1 odds.
Xhaka recorded a shot on target in three of his five Euro 2024 appearances.
Denmark are marginal favourites at 11/8 to come away with the win, while the visitors are 19/10 to cause an upset.
For those predicting a draw, that is priced at odds of 21/10.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Switzerland's Granit Xhaka to register a shot on target vs Denmark has been boosted to 3/1
Xhaka had a shot on target in three of his five Euro 2024 appearances for Switzerland
Christian Eriksen was fouled on four occasions across his four games at Euro 2024
